data.lyric:
[ti:Paranoid]
[ar:Post Malone]
[al:beerbongs & bentleys (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Paranoid - Post Malone
[00:03.40]Lyrics by：Austin Post/Idan Kalai/Louis Bell/Alexander Krashinsky/Carl Rosen/William Walsh
[00:06.81]Composed by：Austin Post/Idan Kalai/Louis Bell/Alexander Krashinsky/Carl Rosen/William Walsh
[00:10.21]Produced by：Cashio/Blueysport/Louis Bell
[00:13.62]Never know when someone come and try to take my life
[00:16.53]I've been sleepin' with the .45 like every night
[00:18.95]
[00:19.52]In the whip I pray to God I don't see flashin' lights
[00:22.53]God d**n they right behind me
[00:24.53]
[00:25.57]And I wake up everyday
[00:27.49]I wake up every day with this anxiety
[00:30.21]
[00:31.65]And they know where I stay
[00:33.24]Got "Malone" on my plates
[00:34.70]And they followin' me
[00:36.77]Two hundred bands under the floor of the kitchen
[00:39.71]A little more up in the walls and the ceilin'
[00:42.24]
[00:42.85]Even family and friends started switchin'
[00:45.24]
[00:45.86]Ever since I got that check seen 'em itchin'
[00:48.32]
[00:49.61]Eyes open I see you I'm watchin' you
[00:53.24]
[00:55.49]More people wanna be you don't trust no one
[00:59.18]
[01:00.47]Tell me why I can get no relief
[01:03.85]I can't even sleep
[01:06.53]Wonderin' when they'll come for me
[01:09.87]
[01:12.54]A paranoid man makes paranoid plans
[01:15.31]I do what I can but it's out of my hands
[01:18.33]Strugglin' just to find my peace
[01:21.89]
[01:25.36]Sometimes feel like I got no friends
[01:28.23]Can't trust a soul like I'm Snowden
[01:30.59]
[01:31.19]Right by the bed keep it loaded
[01:33.55]
[01:34.22]Lord have mercy if they broke in
[01:36.47]I don't ever sleep yeah I'm wide awake
[01:39.37]If you try to pull up to my place
[01:42.54]Beam is gonna hit you a mile away
[01:45.19]I promise one of us gonna die today
[01:48.23]Helicopters in the sky
[01:50.56]
[01:51.21]No he can't escape the eyes
[01:53.48]
[01:54.27]Politicians and the lies
[01:56.62]Tell me what's the point in pickin' sides
[01:59.49]
[02:00.52]Tell me why I can get no relief
[02:03.83]I can't even sleep
[02:06.37]Wonderin' when they'll come for me
[02:09.87]
[02:12.29]A paranoid man makes paranoid plans
[02:15.39]I do what I can but it's out of my hands
[02:18.44]Strugglin' just to find my peace
[02:21.81]
[02:24.85]Ayy
[02:25.04]
[02:25.84]Mind is runnin' all day
[02:27.45]Cost me more than money and I'm payin' the price yeah
[02:30.53]
[02:31.72]I ain't goin' nowhere
[02:33.41]Killin' myself so I can make me a life yeah
[02:36.84]Minute after minute never had a limit
[02:39.78]Woke up every mornin' knew that I just had to get it
[02:42.90]Windows always tinted you ain't lookin' in it
[02:45.80]Either way I know they'll come for me again
[02:48.35]Tell me why I can get no relief
[02:51.87]I can't even sleep
[02:54.50]Wonderin' when they'll come for me
[02:57.87]
[03:00.20]A paranoid man makes paranoid plans
[03:03.42]I do what I can but it's out of my hands
[03:06.42]Strugglin' just to find my peace
data.trans:
[ti:Paranoid]
[ar:Post Malone]
[al:beerbongs & bentleys (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:03.40]//
[00:06.81]//
[00:10.21]//
[00:13.62]从未想过会有人闯入我的生活 甚至想主宰我的生命
[00:16.53]每晚睡觉旁边都放着一把45式
[00:18.95]
[00:19.52]我向上帝祈求了一根鞭子 但我看不见光明
[00:22.53]上帝啊 该死的 他们就在我身后
[00:24.53]
[00:25.57]我每天醒来
[00:27.49]每天都带着焦虑感醒来
[00:30.21]
[00:31.65]你知道我待在哪里
[00:33.24]我独自一人
[00:34.70]他们跟随着我
[00:36.77]厨房地板下有几百根金带
[00:39.71]多看几眼天花板
[00:42.24]
[00:42.85]亲朋好友也都变了
[00:45.24]
[00:45.86]自从我拿到了那张支票 我就面临一个大难题
[00:48.32]
[00:49.61]睁开双眼看见你 我一直看着你
[00:53.24]
[00:55.49]越来越多的人想变成你这样 不相信任何人
[00:59.18]
[01:00.47]告诉我为何我无法得到解脱
[01:03.85]我甚至都辗转难眠
[01:06.53]我好奇为什么他们都朝我而来
[01:09.87]
[01:12.54]我只是一个偏执的男人 带着偏执的想法
[01:15.31]我会尽我所能 但那实在是超乎我的能力
[01:18.33]我奋力抗争 只为寻求一片安宁
[01:21.89]
[01:25.36]有时感觉自己并无至交好友
[01:28.23]无法相信任何人 像个冷血之人
[01:30.59]
[01:31.19]内心满是焦虑
[01:33.55]
[01:34.22]上帝啊 若是这些焦虑爆发 请怜悯我
[01:36.47]我无法入睡 整夜清醒
[01:39.37]若你想贸然进入我的领地
[01:42.54]我会在你尚有一段距离时就开始攻击你
[01:45.19]我发誓 今天不是你死就是我亡
[01:48.23]空中直升机在盘旋
[01:50.56]
[01:51.21]不 他无法逃脱他人的双眼
[01:53.48]
[01:54.27]政治家的谎言
[01:56.62]告诉我最重要的是站队
[01:59.49]
[02:00.52]告诉我为何我无法得到解脱
[02:03.83]我甚至都辗转难眠
[02:06.37]我好奇为什么他们都朝我而来
[02:09.87]
[02:12.29]我只是一个偏执的男人 带着偏执的想法
[02:15.39]我会尽我所能 但那实在是超乎我的能力
[02:18.44]我奋力抗争 只为寻求一片安宁
[02:21.81]
[02:24.85]//
[02:25.04]
[02:25.84]大脑每天都转个不停
[02:27.45]不只是花钱 我还付出了惨痛代价
[02:30.53]
[02:31.72]我无处可去
[02:33.41]自杀然后获得新生
[02:36.84]没有必要 无拘无束
[02:39.78]每天早上醒来 我知道我必须这样
[02:42.90]窗户一直斜着 你看不到外面
[02:45.80]但我知道他们会再次将我掩埋
[02:48.35]告诉我为何我无法得到解脱
[02:51.87]我甚至都辗转难眠
[02:54.50]我好奇为什么他们都朝我而来
[02:57.87]
[03:00.20]我只是一个偏执的男人 带着偏执的想法
[03:03.42]我会尽我所能 但那实在是超乎我的能力
[03:06.42]我奋力抗争 只为寻求一片安宁
